explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Machine Learning techniques (GPR-Tree and GPR-EI) for pricing American options.
explanations.regression: The paper uses Gaussian Process Regression (GPR) to approximate the value of the option, which is a regression technique.
explanations.Gaussian Process Regression: The paper specifically mentions the use of Gaussian Process Regression (GPR) for approximating the option value on exercise dates.
